metadata.Title: CVE-2016-4438 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The REST plugin in Apache Struts 2 2.3.19 through 2.3.28.1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted expression.

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Chao Jack PKAV_香草 and Shinsaku Nomura

criterions.comment: libstruts1.2-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
